name: Inbox by Gmail [ Header Bar Color Change ]
description: Change the color of the header in Inbox by Gmail.
additional_info: if you want to change to your own colors just edit the CSS code by changing the HEX color code, ie; /--------------------\ | #AAFF00 ---------| \--------------------/ Nothing fancy, nothing complex. Just there if you wish to change the default blue color to something else. Hopefully in future Google may implement a color changing option for Inbox. - - - - - - UPDATE -- 2014—12—31: Fixed:- Search Bar would show colors incorrectly, fixed to comment out certain lines. Added:- A color fix for when selecting multiple emails, so the text isn't blue.
